Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

enumDescriptions.GloballyAccessible: The endpoints listed in this zone are accessible to any external entity that has the correct access details (which may include authorization information).
enumDescriptions.NonZonedAccessible: The endpoints listed in this zone are accessible to any external entity that is not explicitly listed in another zone.
enumDescriptions.ZoneOnly: The endpoints listed in this zone are accessible only to other endpoints listed in this zone.

enumLongDescriptions.GloballyAccessible: This indicates that all endpoints explicitly listed in this zone are visible from other endpoints, regardless of zone.
enumLongDescriptions.NonZonedAccessible: This indicates that all endpoints explicitly listed in this zone are visible from other endpoints that are not currently in another zone.
enumLongDescriptions.ZoneOnly: This indicates that only endpoints explictly listed in this zone are visible to the other endpoints explictly listed in this zone.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: Represents an array of references to the endpoints that are contained in this zone.
Endpoints.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Endpoint.

InvolvedSwitches.description: Represents an array of references to the switches in this zone.
InvolvedSwitches.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resources that this zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Switch.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

ResourceBlocks.description: An array of references to the Resource Blocks that are used in this Zone.
ResourceBlocks.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type ResourceBlock that are associated with this Zone.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Zone.description: The Zone schema represents a fabric zone.
Zone.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a simple zone for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ExternalAccessibility.description: How is this zone accessible to endpoints not explicitly listed.
ExternalAccessibility.longDescription: This value shall indicate how the zone is accessible to endpoints not explicity named in this zone.

Identifiers.longDescription: Identifiers for this zone shall be unique in the context of other zones.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

title: #Zone.v1_3_0.Zone
